Hi.

At http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/vhosts/name-based.html#namevip it is claimed that name based vhosting would not work with SSL (due to it's nature).

This seems however to be wrong, either by using SNI which seems to be supported by Apache (or the relevant mods) (http://wiki.apache.org/httpd/NameBasedSSLVHostsWithSNI)
or by http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2817.txt (thought I'm not sure whether this is supported.

Not sure how to best change this? Linking to the wiki?

Cheers,
Chris.

text: Yes, we need to update that doc to reflect the new reality. I'll take care of that this week. Thanks for letting us know.
